verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}“Come and dine,” the Master calls us, “Come and dine” We may feast at Jesus’ table all the time! He who fed the multitude, Turned the water into wine, To the hungry calling now, “Come and dine.”{/lang-eng}

verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now until that glorious day, You have given us a way To partake of You throughout the night and day. So the food we daily eat, And the water we do drink, Oh, remind us just how simple is Your way!{/lang-eng}
